channel.title: Enteric viruses on The Swedish Pathogens Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Enteric viruses on The Swedish Pathogens Portal

item.title: Cryo-electron tomography allows new knowledge about poliovirus replication and assembly sites in situ
item.description: Dahmane et al (2022) used Cryo-electron tomography to provide an integrated structural framework for multiple stages of the poliovirus life cycle. Data and code are shared openly.
